features.title: Everything You Need to Elevate Your Stream
features.subtitle:
Packed with powerful tools, our app makes it effortless to display and
customize your Valorant stats. From seamless setup to full
personalization, we’ve got everything to make your stream shine.

first.title: Compatible with Popular Streaming Software
first.description:
We support all major streaming platforms,
including OBS Studio, Streamlabs, XSplit, and more.
Integration is quick and easy, ensuring your stats
are live without technical hassle.

second.title: Design Reflects Your Style
second.description:
Make your stream yours!
Customize overlay colors and layout to match
your unique style and stand out with
a professional look.

third.title: Set It and Forget It
third.description:
Enjoy a hassle-free experience!
Once you set up the overlay, the app works
automatically to display your live stats,
ensuring everything stays updated
without requiring manual adjustments.

streamers.title: Streamers Spotlight
streamers.subtitle:
Top Valorant streamers already showcase their stats with our app.
Want to see your name here? Log in to our platform. We might feature you next!

source.title: Open Source
source.subtitle:
Our application's source code is fully accessible on GitHub.
We welcome everyone to view, utilize, and contribute to its development.
